Header: The President donates funds to the Karate-Do Federation and a mother of triplets
Content: President Maithripala Sirisena donated funds to the Sri Lanka Karate-Do Federation and a mother of triplets. Three million rupees was donated to the Sri Lanka Karate-Do Federation by the President to purchase equipment for continuing the sport. Secretary of the Federation, KeerthiBasnayakereceived the financial donation from the President. Meanwhile, P M Hemanthi a mother of newly born triplets from the Nupe area in Matara received one Million rupees from the President for the betterment of the children. The financial support was extended as per a request made to the President.
